category: National Sports Competition Regulations/Article 12 (Rights and business regarding competition emblems, etc.)
contents: Article 12 (Rights and business related to competition emblems, etc.) ① All matters related to the competition emblem, competition mascot, and competition slogan (including the competition motto in the case of the National Life Sports Festival) used by the organizing committee with the approval of the Sports Council in accordance with Article 11. The rights are exclusive to the organizing committee from the date of approval for use by the Sports Council until the end of the competition. However, if you wish to use this to conduct a badge business, the type and contents of the badge business must be discussed in advance with the Sports Council. Revised 2016. 6. 16., 2022. 1. 24. ② After the end of the competition, all rights regarding the competition emblem, competition mascot and competition slogan (including the competition slogan in the case of the National Life Sports Festival) are jointly owned by the Sports Association and the Organizing Committee. If someone else wants to use it, they must obtain prior approval from the sports association and the organizing committee.
